content.description: When Astrid wears a bright red dress on New Year’s Day, her friends believe she is trying to stand out from the crowd and get attention. However, in Astrid’s culture, the color red symbolizes good luck and happiness.
content.question: Which of the following factors best explains these differing interpretations?

choices.label: How sunk-cost fallacies can lead to negative outcomes
How informational social norms influence behavior

skill.text: 1.B: Explain how cultural norms, expectations, and circumstances, as well as cognitive biases apply to behavior and mental processes.
